segments.text: Last weekend I didn't want to go out either , so I stayed at home and played video games by myself . It was really fun !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah , that sounds pretty cool , I guess ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I'm really into video games . In fact , all my friends are on the Internet . I've never met any of them in the real world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh really ... well you must be very popular on the Internet . But it's true that it's nice to do some things in the comfort of your own home .
segments.speaker: S2
